Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<java.lang.Object>
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<java.lang.Object>
public class MainController
extends Observable<java.lang.Object>
implements Observer<java.lang.Object>
Class used to handle each stage based on the Message received by the Client. MainController is used to observe Client and it's observed by Client.
